metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16870 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that wolfssl before 3.15.7 is vulnerable to a new variant of the Bleichenbacher attack to perform downgrade attacks against TLS. This may lead to leakage of sensible data.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
